bdi4jade.belief

Class TransientBelief<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl
      • bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBelief<K,V>
        • bdi4jade.belief.TransientBelief<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the belief name.
    V - the type of the belief value.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Belief<K,V>, MetadataElement, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransientPredicate

    public class TransientBelief<K,V>
extends AbstractBelief<K,V>
    This class extends the AbstractBelief class and represents a transient belief, which is not persisted in a permanent memory.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
